body_html:
Hi renats,
Thank you for your reply. I already checked your post, but I want to know the commands that you used to build the project using bazel.

And the other thing is you have used bazel to build the project, But I need to use gradle in Android Studio.

Please help me on this

body:
Hi renats, 
                 Thank you for your reply. I already checked your post, but I want to know the **commands that you used to build the project using bazel**.

 And the other thing is you have used bazel to build the project, But I need to **use gradle in Android Studio.**

Please help me on this
